MCU.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
MCU.description: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a 'Super-Soldier serum'. But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organization.

MCU.title: Agent Carter
MCU.description: Frustrated at being marginalized at work, Peggy Carter goes on an unauthorized solo field mission.

MCU.title: Agent Carter: Season 1
MCU.description: In 1946, Peggy Carter is relegated to secretarial duties in the Strategic Scientific Reserve (SSR). When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis.

MCU.title: Agent Carter: Season 2
MCU.description: In 1947, Peggy Carter is working for the covert SSR, but when the new Chief, Daniel Sousa, asks her to help him take down Leviathan, she refuses. When Howard Stark is accused of treason, he secretly recruits Peggy to clear his name with the help of his butler, Edwin Jarvis.

MCU.title: Captain Marvel
MCU.description: Carol Danvers becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races.

MCU.title: Iron Man
MCU.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

MCU.title: Iron Man 2
MCU.description: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.

MCU.title: The Consultant
MCU.description: Agent Coulson informs Agent Sitwell that the World Security Council wishes Emil Blonsky to be released from prison to join the Avengers Initiative. As Nick Fury doesn't want to release Blonsky, the two agents decide to send a patsy to sabotage the meeting...

MCU.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Thor's Hammer
MCU.description: Phil Coulson stops at a convenience store and deals with a coincidental robbery during his visit.

MCU.title: Thor
MCU.description: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.

MCU.title: Avengers Assemble
MCU.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

MCU.title: Item 47
MCU.description: SHIELD agent Sitwell is assigned to recover an abandoned Chitauri weapon being used by a young couple robbing a bank.

MCU.title: All Hail the King
MCU.description: A documentary filmmaker interviews the now-famous Trevor Slattery from behind bars.

MCU.title: Iron Man 3
MCU.description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

MCU.title: Agents of Shield: Season 1, eps 1-7
MCU.description: The missions of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.
